title: Remove caffeine.ai link from site footer

requirements.summary: Remove the caffeine.ai hyperlink from the footer copyright line while keeping the rest of the footer intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The rendered footer no longer contains any clickable link to https://caffeine.ai.
No reference to the string "https://caffeine.ai" remains in frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx.
The rest of the footer layout (including the copyright text, heart icon, and other links) continues to render without visual or runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Remove the anchor element linking to https://caffeine.ai (including target and rel attributes) from the copyright line, and adjust surrounding text so the line still reads naturally while preserving the existing layout, Heart icon, and all other footer links. Ensure the string "https://caffeine.ai" no longer exists in this file.
